_source.text: According to his mother , he found being kidnapped by aliens very exciting and claimed it was better than the things they show on Captain Cosmos .

text: According to his **mother** , he found being kidnapped by aliens very exciting and **claimed** it was **better** **than** the things they **show** on Captain Cosmos .

_source.text: 2. Still better than the stuff SyFy puts out 3. Liked it more than I liked the pilot of Terra Nova 4. If they could show blood it would be better.

text: 2. Still **better** **than** the stuff SyFy puts out 3. Liked it more than I liked **the** **pilot** of Terra Nova 4. If they could **show** blood it would be better.

_source.text: 24 may be yet another show where the run of the series makes you think the pilot was much better than it actually was.

text: 24 may be yet another **show** where the run of the series makes you think **the** **pilot** was much **better** **than** it actually was.

_source.text: Adobe Flash : The show was initially animated in a much earlier version of Flash (for the pilot and season 1), since the line quality was much better than the more recent versions.

season 1), since the line quality was much **better** **than** the more recent versions.
